Recommendations: Precautionary and safety measures and antidote charts be displayed in every laboratory.
Medicine cabinets be properly mounted with enough first aid medicines and materials.
The University may fast-track the refurbishment of the Food Laboratory building at the CBEA compound.
The University may consider the updating and refurbishment of the Speech Laboratory to make it functional.
Present and file clear and properly signed documents. If need be, colored pictures are preferred over black and white prints.
